Articles.Content:
Some of the best looking 4-4.5 gen fighters I know of. They are very nimble and are best flown with sas on.

All fighters are made to be as accurate as possible. Canards were used only like the real life counterparts have done.

Su-35: https://www.dropbox.com/s/94p5cld5d0f5f1h/Su-35.craft

Su-33: https://www.dropbox.com/s/bh0rj03qhpcohdr/Su-33%20MKII.craft

Su-35

Su-33

My next replica is the titan rocket family. Images will be up shortly.

Edited March 4, 2014 by andrew123

Amazing!!! I have tried several times to design a realistic fighter, but these tries always failed

It's late here, so I'll have to wait 'till tomorrow to download them. By the way, could you tell their part counts?
Both are in the range of 220 parts. Controlling the Su-33 should be done in bursts for maximum performance.

Hmm... very nice and realistic. One of the few "realistic" aircraft with at least ballpark TWRs.

Of course, in your screenshots, you are using stock aerodynamics, which makes it about like testing the plane in liquid styrofoam.
Should I try to test it with FAR installed? It used to be my favorite mod of all time.
